name: subculturally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to a subculture (= the way of life, customs, and ideas of a group of people within a society that are different from the rest of society): Within the city, there is so much going on subculturally. They are seeking to be sub-culturally authentic, yet still acceptable to the mainstream.
More examplesFewer examplesThere is a subculturally taught mix of superstition and knowledge. These urban spaces include a rich variety of subculturally distinct residential areas. These concepts are equally applicable to other forms of subculturally induced behaviour.
